title: Professional Competency Development Program Utilizing an Interactive Remote Education System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Remote Education Platform Usage and Discipline-Specific Expertise
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining real-time collaboration via digital devices with asynchronous content learning, emphasizing practical problem-solving skills for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Solve complex professional problems at least twice using real-time interaction tools (screen sharing, annotation, etc.) on remote education platforms
Analyze asynchronous learning materials (videos, simulations) to produce one field-specific practical report and conduct peer reviews
Conduct a team-based project in a blended learning environment and submit/present one final deliverable (prototype/analysis report)
Record at least five instances of peer feedback exchange using digital collaboration tools and incorporate improvements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
